channel.title: AllPlayersInactive - Useful Procedure

item.title: AllPlayersInactive - Useful Procedure
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

I know this is old, but it still could be made a lot shorter.

function ActivePlayers: Integer; var i: Integer; begin for i := 0 to HowManyPlayers - 1 do if (Players[CurrentPlayer].Active = True) then Result := Result + 1; end;

function InActivePlayers: Integer; var i: Integer; begin for i := 0 to HowManyPlayers - 1 do if (Players[CurrentPlayer].Active = False) then Result := Result + 1; end;

Read full topic

item.title: AllPlayersInactive - Useful Procedure
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

Nice, may i ask why you need the var in the first function though?

[php]
function HowManyPlayersInactive: Integer;
var
Player, NumberOfInactivePlayers: Integer;
begin
NumberOfInactivePlayers:= 0;
for Player:= 0 to HowManyPlayers - 1 do
begin
if(Players[Player].Active = False) then
NumberOfInactivePlayers:= NumberOfInactivePlayers + 1;
end;
Result:= NumberOfInactivePlayers;
end;
[/php]

Could it not just be

[php]
function HowManyPlayersInactive: Integer;
var
Player: Integer;
begin
NumberOfInactivePlayers:= 0;
for Player:= 0 to HowManyPlayers - 1 do
begin
if(Players[Player].Active = False) then
Result:= Result + 1;
end;
end;
[/php]

very cool though

Read full topic

item.title: AllPlayersInactive - Useful Procedure
item.dc:creator: @N4TH4N N4TH4N
item.description:
@N4TH4N wrote:

http://www.villu-reborn.com/showthread.php?p=42936#post42936

Well I didn’t see this in SRL and NextPlayer was against their ‘no endless loops’ policy.

[SCAR]{*****************************************************************************
function HowManyPlayersInactive: Integer;
By: TOB
Description: Counts how many players in the Players array are set to inactive
*****************************************************************************}
function HowManyPlayersInactive: Integer;
var
Player: Integer;
begin
for Player:= 0 to HowManyPlayers - 1 do
begin
if(Players[Player].Active = False) then
Result:= Result + 1;
end;
end;

{*****************************************************************************
procedure AllPlayersInactive;
By: TOB
Description: Checks to see if all players are set to inactive, if True terminates script
*****************************************************************************}
procedure AllPlayersInactive;
var
InactivePlayers: Integer;
begin
InactivePlayers:= HowManyPlayersInactive;
if(InactivePlayers = HowManyPlayers) then
begin
WriteLn(TheTime + ’ All players are inactive, terminating script’);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;[/SCAR]

Here is Login.scar implemented with AllPlayersInactive

Read full topic
